title: [GAMEPLAY] Kha'zix evolves R two times
body:
If you don't upgrade any ability nor use your three evolves and get to level 18, you can evolve Kha'zix's R two times and a different ability one time, there may be more ways to execute this or may not be as strict as I detailed it but that's how I pulled it off.

1. Get to level 18 without upgrading any ability nor using evolves.
2. Spam Ctrl+R to unlock your ultimate, level it up to 3 and evolve it.

I tried this in practice tool and I'm not sure about actual PVP matches but I managed to pull this off three games in a row.
